abstract: Video of two Canadians, one Norwegian and one Filipino kidnapped island of Mindanao, Philippines, appears genuine, according to authorities; depicts hostages pleading for mercy against backdrop of masked men with Islamic State flags.
lead_paragraph: The recording seems to show three foreigners and a woman from the Philippines seized at a resort last month, held by masked men with an Islamic State flag.

headline.main: Philippine Military Says Kidnapping Video Appears to Be Authentic
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; The Philippines: Video Shows Kidnapped Foreigners and Filipino

snippet: The recording seems to show three foreigners and a woman from the Philippines seized at a resort last month, held by masked men with an Islamic State flag.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
